page.title: 08Alumwell Schools
page.content:
s
Alumwell is the name of our area.It is so called as many years ago there was a well with water rich in the mineral Alum. On the large open site next to the M6 motorway there are four schools: the nursery, Infants, Junior, and Comprehensive. All of the schools share the name Alumwell. This can lead to a lot of problems. If letters are not properly addressed they go to the wrong school. Often people call at the wrong school because they do not read the notice boards carefully. Although we have the M6 motorway next to us we are very lucky because we have the best and biggest playing fields in the whole of Walsall.
